review: I am usually a bit leery of new gadgets, don't alway have the best luck with them which is undoubedly "user error" :)  This one was just as advertised - super simple to install and use.  Tiny so you don't see it on the TVconsole/stand and it 100% works as they say it will.  Its so convenient to just stream the videos and the PRIME library is free and has a decent selection.  Haven't tried a rental yet but I have no doubt that it will be just as easy.  It connected right up to our wireless without a hitch.  Its a lot like a Kindle - once you have one, you don't want to go back to the old ways!
author: C. Kane

review: Bought this product after much research.  The first unit must have been faulty because the audio had a tinny ring which was very annoying.  I tried several speakers, TVs, & cables to no avail.  So I returned for another unit.  This time I ordered the recommended HDMI cable ( http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B003L1ZYYM/ref=cm_cr_ryp_prd_ttl_sol_2 ) and the new unit worked perfectly.  I am so pleased with the Fire TV.  It is so small about the size of 2 CD cases stacked.  It is very easy to connect and begin watching.  It starts up and runs through the setup, shows the home network to connect to and bada bing bada boom.  Go to Netfiix and sign into your account.  So easy.  The Voice Search is incredible!  I am in my 60's and it is very easy to use this product.  For years I have had Netflix and what a pain to always have to hook up my laptop to the TV to watch movies.  Don't forget to switch the input on your TV to the alternate source (such as HDMI 2) to be able to access the Fire TV.At the same time, I ordered the Kindle Fire HDX 7".  I am an avid reader and these two products work hand-in-glove.I rarely rate products, but these are over the top in quality and features.  My son bought this for me and I highly recommend that you "kids" get these for your parents. :)  It keeps me busy and out of my kids' biz.  Haha!
